chatroomserver

Class ChatRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • chatroomserver.ChatRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ChatRoom
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class handles a specific chat room and its users.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      Name of the chat room

      The hash of the password to allow new people to enter

      Dictionary of all the sockets

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatRoom

        public ChatRoom(java.lang.String roomName)
        Creates a new chat room thread and sets its name.
        Parameters:
        roomName - The name of the chat room.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The main function of the thread. Exiting this function closes the thread. Checks to see if the room is empty every X seconds and returns if it is.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the chat room and removes its name from this list in ChatRoomServer.java

      • newClientThread

        public void newClientThread(java.lang.String username)
        Creates a new thread to listen for massages from a specific client.
        Parameters:
        username - Username for the specific user.

      • messageAll

        public void messageAll(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to all users in the chat room.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that you want to send.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String username,
                    java.net.Socket newSock)
        Adds a new user to the chat room.
        Parameters:
        username - Username for the new user.
        newSock - The socket of the new user.

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(java.lang.String username)
        Removes the specific user from the chat room.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of who should be removed.

      • getUsers

        public java.lang.String getUsers()
        Used by client to determine if a username can be chosen.
        Returns:
        The usernames of everyone in the chat room concatinated together.
